info_text: The model is wearing a S size and is 5 feets tall

description.title: Style Note
description.text: Look like a dream as you wear this Kurti in pink coloured from the  house of Abhishti. Exclusively designed this Kurti with regular fit will enhance your curves and soft polyster will keep you comfortable. The dupatta will further accentuate your ethnic look.

description.title: Product Details
description.text: Surprise your friends with your gorgeous ethnic avatar this summer with this peach kurta from W. Best worn with modish leggings and flats, this regular-fit kurta promises uber comfort too, courtesy its poly crepe fabric.
